result.arabic_text: وَتِلۡكَ ٱلۡأَمۡثَٰلُ نَضۡرِبُهَا لِلنَّاسِۖ وَمَا يَعۡقِلُهَآ إِلَّا ٱلۡعَٰلِمُونَ
result.translation: 43. Kaadu too ceelalloola sinaamah tet naagure (baxxaqisna) edde yantifiqeenï gidah, kaadu teetil kas-kassowtam matan Yalla taaxigeeh, kay amri oggolta tu- taaxagó akke waytek.
